courses.title: Técnicas de cuchillo y cortes
courses.bio: Aprenderás las técnicas básicas de cómo se debe usar el cuchillo correctamente en la Cocina, para cortar y picar
objectives: Aprenderás las técnicas básicas de cómo se debe usar el cuchillo, la posición de las manos y la correcta ergonomía
Cómo realizar los cortes universales de la manera más segura y eficiente

Cortes con el cuchillo: Cortes en la cebolla plumas, cincelado y doble cincelado
Cortes en battonet y cubos o cuadros
Cortes en el pimiento o pimentón
Cortes en el ajoporro o apio España

requirements: Te debe gustar la cocina
courses.description:
Todo buen cocinero sabe que aprender a usar correctamente el cuchillo es la base de una carrera prometedora.
En este curso aprenderás las técnicas básicas de cómo se debe usar el cuchillo, la posición de las manos, la correcta ergonomía y cómo realizar los cortes universales de la manera más segura y eficiente.
Suscríbete ya y aprende los secretos de la mano de Merlín Gessen
target_audience: Estudiantes y entusiastas de la cocina y cualquier otra persona que quiera mejorar sus habilidades en la cocina

courses.title: Come fare un pane croccante in casa!
courses.bio: Metodo in 9 ore, senza impastatrice, senza lavorazione faticosa, con pietra refrattaria per cottura in forno a casa
objectives: Come ottenere un pagnotta di pane CROCCANTE fuori e soffice dentro!
Come panificare utilizzando la tecnica delle "pieghe", un comodissimo metodo che consente di fare a meno della FASE DI IMPASTO.
Come dare la caratteristica forma tondeggiante alla pagnotta, e come evitare che si deformi durante la cottura.
Come usare in modo intelligente la pietra refrattaria.
Come regolare il forno di casa in modo da ottenere un pane ben cotto, croccante, e mai bruciato.
Acquisirai un metodo di lievitazione molto dettagliato (con orari precisi per ogni fase).

Utensili e Impasto: Quali sono gli utensili di cui ci serviremo
IN OMAGGIO - Come fare i panini per hamb: Lo staglio: la formazione dei panetti

requirements: Il corso illustra passo passo ogni singola fase, senza trascurare davvero nulla. Per questo motivo è adatto anche ai principianti.
Gli utensili necessari sono di uso comune e facilmente reperibili. È ad ogni modo necessaria una pietra refrattaria per pizza.
courses.description:
Che ne diresti di imparare a fare, nel tuo semplice forno di casa, un pane con una crosta super croccante e soffice dentro?
Ti illustrerò in circa 35 minuti come ottenere un risultato davvero impressionante, senza bisogno di impastatrice o forno a legna.
La tecnica delle "pieghe", infatti ti consentirà di fare a meno della lunga lavorazione
L'utilizzo di una pietra refrattaria invece ti consentirà di raggiungere in forno alte temperature e di non bruciare mai il fondo del pane.
Se sei stanco del pane comprato, questo è il corso che fa per te. Provalo, non ti pentirai :-)


P.S. In omaggio ho inserito anche un mini-corso per fare i sofficissimi panini per hamburger!
Spero che gradirai l'idea! :-)
Non ho altro da aggiungere, ti aspetto per iniziare questa nuova gustosissima avventura, a tra poco!
Claudia
target_audience: Questo corso è approriato per te se sei un appassionato di cucina e sei stanco di comprare a carissimo prezzo pane di scarsa qualità.
Se sei stufo di mangiare pane che diventa duro come pietra già il giorno dopo, o che addirittura si ammuffisce.
Se vuoi smettere di sentirti gonfio dopo aver mangiato una fetta di pane strapieno di lievito.
Se sei curioso di sapere che sapore aveva il pane dei tuoi nonni (posso assicurarti che è molto più ricco e fragrante).
Se vuoi creare l'atmosfera di "casa" ovunque ti trovi nel mondo.

courses.title: Cook Like a Thai 4 Cooking Course
courses.bio: Thai cooking for homemakers & chefs taught by Chef Dao of Thai Chef School in Bangkok, fun teacher of Thai cooking
objectives: Learn about Thai ingredients
Master preparation of popular Thai dishes
Learn basic Thai cooking skills
Learn how to work with a wok, steamer, granite mortar & pestle
Learn how to prepare from scratch Thai pastes, dips, and sauces
Experience the awe of visiting a Thai fresh market
requirements: Course is designed for all skill levels.  No matter your skill level, you will learn more.
Just bring your desire to learn how to prepare tasty dishes from this popular cuisine
courses.description:
HAVE FUN LEARNING TO "COOK LIKE A THAI"
with Chef Dao & Thai Chef School
DO YOU WANT TO "COOK LIKE A THAI"?
Join this fun culinary adventure with me, and experience the fun and exotic world of authentic Thai cooking, one of the world's most popular cuisines.  Visit Bangkok's largest fresh market and learn all about Thai ingredients.  Master 8 popular Thai dishes plus many Thai cooking skills, dips, sauces, and pastes.  Experience the beauty of Thai dishes when properly cooked, plated, lighted, and recorded.  I also have more Thai cooking courses in Udemy.  Please check them out too.
HAVE FUN LEARNING
Enjoy my fun, relaxed teaching style which comes from years of experience teaching students in Bangkok.  Relax, laugh, cook, and eat the best tasting Thai dishes--GUARANTEED!
MORE FOR YOUR MONEY
1.  4 hours 15 minutes of fun learning (compare and see for yourself)
2.  Take a fun tour of Bangkok's largest fresh market and be amazed
3.  Learn basic Thai cooking skills and techniques
4.  Learn 8 popular Thai dishes from scratch
ENHANCED QUALITY
Using HD quality video recording equipment, professional lighting, skilled photographers, and good English, we endeavor to present the very best viewing presentation possible.  Compare for yourself.
IS THIS COURSE FOR YOU?
This course is taught by Chef Dao, a professional culinary instructor at Thai Chef School (an online culinary training school) and Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy in Bangkok for both beginners and professionals.  Learn from a fun teacher used to teaching all skill levels the ins and outs of Thai cooking.  Each dish is taught in 4 video segments (total about 20 minutes each):
1.  Thai ingredients discussion with pictures
2.  Preparation of all ingredients for cooking
3.  Professional chef cooking demonstration
4.  Food plating techniques
WHAT WILL YOU LEARN FROM THIS COURSE?
Familiarity with Thai ingredients
Mastery of selected popular dishes, dips, sauces, pastes
Achievement of correct Thai flavors, aroma, and appearance
Proper use of Thai cookware--woks, granite mortar & pestle, steamers
AND lots of fun and laughter.
WHO IS CHEF DAO?
I am a native of northeast Thailand, where my love for cooking was nurtured by my grandmother in her kitchen.  After receiving my degree in Accounting, I moved to Bangkok.  There I soon realized my love was for cooking and eating beans and not in counting them!    To expand my culinary skills, I enrolled in Le Cordon Bleu where I learned Western cooking and basic culinary skills.  After graduation, I then enrolled in Dusit Thani Culinary College to further my Thai cooking knowledge.
For the past 6 years, I have been fortunate to work as a professional culinary instructor at Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy and Thai Chef School, leading Thai cooking schools in Bangkok.  During this time, I taught Thai cooking to many tourists as well as professional culinary students (aspiring chefs, yacht chefs, executive chefs) from around the world in weeklong private training courses.  Additionally, I am a master fruit carver and a team building specialist.
I love eating, cooking, and teaching Thai cooking (oh, and my son too).  Please join me and let's have fun learning together.
BANGKOK THAI COOKING ACADEMY & THAI CHEF SCHOOL
In affiliation with these cooking schools, this course relies on tried and proven recipes and teaching techniques developed over 10 years and taught to thousands of students in Bangkok.  We teach Thai cooking to beginners and professionals alike.  Please feel free to visit our websites.
OUR PROMISE TO YOU
My instruction is fun, clear, and easy to follow.  Recipes are authentic and accurate.  Videos are filmed in HD and well-lighted.  Sound is good and English is good.  Beautiful presentation of dishes is emphasized.  If you have any questions about the course content, please post a question or send a direct message to me.  I will answer your message promptly.
CHEF DAO
JUST CLICK THE ENROLL BUTTON, AND I'LL SEE YOU IN LECTURE #1.
target_audience: Home cooks will learn to master tasty Thai dishes
Professional cooks and chefs improve your culinary skills and knowledge of Asian cooking

courses.title: PASTEL DE NATA - Curso de Pasteles de Nata Portugueses
courses.bio: Pastéis de Belém. Aprende la receta del más emblemático pastel de Portugal con un pastelero de 5ta generación en Lisboa.
objectives: Mi receta premiada de auténtico Pastel de Nata portugués (también conocido como Pastel de Belém)
Hojaldre casero de raíz
Trucos y secretos para hornear Pastel de Nata como hacen los profesionales (¡no son todos iguales!)
Consejos generales para hornear fácilmente en casa con resultados increíbles
Historia y curiosidades sobre la repostería tradicional portuguesa

Historia de Pastel de Nata: Breve historia del Pastel de Nata
Fabricación de la Masa Base y del Hojald: Masa base: con amasadora y a mano
Hojaldre: convertir la masa base en hojaldre crujiente
La crema, o sea, el relleno del Pastel d: Cómo hacer el cremoso relleno de Pastel de Nata.
Toques finales y horneado: Cómo preparar moldes de pastel de nata para el primer uso
Dar forma a la masa y finalizar el relleno
Paso final (¡y el mejor!): ¡Degustar tus: ¡Degustación y gracias por hacer este curso conmigo! :)

requirements: Este curso está abierto a TODOS los niveles, no se requiere experiencia previa en repostería o cocina.
Si eres un profesional o has hecho Pastel de Nata antes, también incluimos algunos secretos y trucos para perfeccionar tu técnica de Pastel de Nata.
Utilizamos ingredientes fáciles de encontrar en cualquier parte del mundo, ¡no te preocupes!
courses.description:
Pastel de Nata es el dulce más famoso de Portugal. Conocido como Pastel de Belém en Brasil, Egg Tart (dàntǎ) en Asia y Portuguese Custard Tart en muchas partes del mundo, estas tartaletas de hojaldre son rellenas de una crema suave y es difícil comerse solo una de cada vez. Siguiendo este curso, comprenderás qué hace que el auténtico Pastel de Nata sea diferente de las variaciones de Pastel de Belém o "tartas de huevo Portuguesas" que puedas haber probado fuera de Portugal.
Cubriremos todos los pasos de una manera fácil de seguir, y te mostraré los trucos para que tus pasteles sean tan profesionales como los que encontrarás en las pastelerías de mi país. Te voy a dar consejos para la masa y también pequeños trucos para el relleno, para equilibrar maravillosamente sabores y texturas.
Si has probado Pasteles de Nata en una pastelería portuguesa y te gustaría hacerlos en tu casa, este curso te mostrará cómo lograrlo. Si eres pastelero o panadero profesional y tal vez desees servir genuinos pasteles de nata en tu establecimiento, ¡también puedes aprender muchos consejos profesionales siguiendo este curso! ¡Obrigado! :)
*** Los videos de este curso están en castellano, pero incluyen subtítulos en español, inglés y portugués. ***
target_audience: Pasteleros en casa y entusiastas de la panadería y repostería
Pasteleros y panaderos profesionales
Amantes de la comida portuguesa

courses.title: Cooking Arabic Food: sweet and savoury rice dishes
courses.bio: Rich rice meals and complimentary main dishes in Arab cuisine.
objectives: Learn how to cook rice in the Arabian style - using rice to create both sweet and savoury dishes
Prepare some main courses with rice dishes
Learn how to create sweet rice dishes
Cook some sweet and savoury rice dishes for yourself, your friends or family!

Introduction: The Importance of Rice in Arab cuisine

requirements: Students should have a general knowledge of cooking
Students should have basic kitchen skills
courses.description:
The Cooking Arabic food series teaches Arabic style cooking prepared in different Arab nations across the region. These short but efficient lectures should allow you to prepare meals in a short and concise period of time with basic skills. Get inventive with your rice and truly understand the ways in which this grain is used in Arabic cooking.


My name is Aseel Arabia. I am a home chef, a freelance chef and a cook to large events and people all over the world. I specialise in pan-Arab dishes but most of all, the rich tastes and flavours that come from the Levantine. I hope this course will be easy for you to follow so you can replicate and share some of my lovely recipes.


This course specifically teaches the student/chef/cook/enthusiast how to use different types of rice in the preparation of sweet and savoury Arab dishes including rice puddings, Gulf-style Kabsa, calrose or short rice to name a few; including some rice pudding desserts and blended vegetable and meat rice dishes.


In addition, you'll receive a few recipes for complimentary main dishes to go with your rice. This is an excellent start on the basics of cooking rice, not just in Arab cuisine but as a cooking skill in general, and falls under the "Cooking Arabic Food" cooking series.


And if you enjoy cooking these dishes, there's plenty more to try out! Please don't forget to leave a review, I do my best to make people happy through my cooking so any positive feedback is great! Share with your friends!
target_audience: This course is for cooking students, chefs, Arab food lovers and cuisine enthusiasts
Those who are interested in Arab culture

objectives: Os alunos serão incentivados à apreciarem vinhos através de informações práticas e curiosidades históricas que envolvem este saboroso universo de cultura e saúde

SEÇÃO 5 - PAÍSES PRODUTORES DE VINHOS: AULA 13 - NOVO MUNDO E VELHO MUNDO

requirements: Gostar de vinho, saúde e cultura
courses.description: O curso é dividido em 10 seções de aulas elucidativas, desmestificando o complexo, saboroso e excitante universo do vinho. Dicas de degustação, compra, armazenamento, harmonização com alimentos além de curiosidades históricas sobre as regiões produtivas até o engarrafamento deste delicioso elixir chamado vinho. courses.title: WSET Level 1 Award in Wine Course - Practice Questions
courses.bio: Practice Questions Designed by Certified WSET Educator - boost your wine confidence, reinforce your knowledge
courses.description:
Wine and Spirits Education Trust (WSET) is globally recognised for Wine Education Courses and Certifications - respected by sommeliers, wine buyers, importers, and employers worldwide.


WSET is available to everyone - from wine lovers to professionals!


Boost your knowledge, and confidence using our Practice Questions for WSET Level 1 Award in Wine. They are the perfect companion to your wine studies and wine appreciation. These questions are based on the WSET Level 1 Specification and have been created to be similar to the "real exam".


Each exam is timed at 45 mins.
Pass mark - 70%


This resource is designed by WSET Certified Educators to help you if you are;
starting your WSET wine education journey, or
brushing up before the Level 1 Exam, or
just curious and want to get a benchmark of how much you already know.
You’ll gain access to a bank of realistic, exam-style multiple-choice questions that are similar to the official WSET format. Each question is written to reinforce key topics like wine styles, grape varieties, food and wine pairing, wine storage and service - helping you recall essential facts quickly and accurately.


Practice at your own pace, get instant feedback, and identify any knowledge gaps. These questions not only boost your memory they build your confidence.


Don’t just study - study smarter.
Give yourself the best chance of passing the WSET Level 1 exam with flying colours.


Realistic, exam-style multiple-choice questions
Covers key topics: grape varieties, wine styles, food pairing & service
Instant feedback to help identify knowledge gaps
Study at your own pace, anywhere, anytime
Designed to support the WSET Level 1 Award in Wine
Ideal for wine lovers, beginners & hospitality professionals
Boosts confidence and reinforces what you've learned
Perfect companion to your official WSET study materials
target_audience: All wine lovers who want to know a little bit more in a structured format
Anyone thinking of starting WSET Level 2 Award in WIne but not sure if they have enough knowledge
Anyone want to practice the WSET Level 1 Award in Wine style exams

courses.title: Kitchen Knife Skills 101 - Vivront
courses.bio: Learn how to use your kitchen knives with more confidence and apply your skills to make a delicious salsa.
objectives: Learn how to hold, handle and use a kitchen knife safely and efficiently
Understand different knife shapes and movements for different food prep needs
Learn the best way to cut produce like mangoes, peppers and onions
Apply your newly-learned skills to make a delicious mango or peach salsa from scratch!

Introduction: Welcome to the Knife Skills Course!
The Course You're About To Take
All About Knives: How to handle, hold, c: Using the Knife to Help With Your Task
About the Knife's Edge -- Honing to Keep it Sharper Longer
Holding the Knife in your Cutting Hand • Three Ways
Salsa Time!: Intro to the Salsa Recipe • What You Need + What You'll Learn
Mix It All Together + Olive Oil, Lemon, Salt, and Cilantro
Conclusion: So What Did We Learn Today?

requirements: No cooking experience needed. Ideally you should have a kitchen knife, bell pepper(s), an onion,  a mango or peach, and some olive oil, salt and pepper.
courses.description:
Welcome to the Kitchen Knife Skills 101 course by Vivront.


We’re a mission-driven kitchen shop located in Edina, Minnesota. We believe that curiosity is the best approach to learning, and you’ve taken a step in that direction—your innate curiosity led you to click on this course!


We typically offer a 90-minute in-person version of this course at our store. However, since education and accessibility are some of our key values as an organization, we've decided to publish a version here for our remote friends.


We'll go over some kitchen knife basics, including ways to hold the knife, ways to hold the food, how to cut produce including peppers, onions, mangoes, and cilantro.


You’ll learn about a few different types of blade shapes and how to use them to your advantage based on what you're cooking. These knife skills are easiest accomplished when your knife is sharp so we'll also spend some time talking about why knives go dull and how to keep them sharper longer.


We offer on-site sharpening at our store in Edina. If you can’t drop your knives off in-person, you can mail your knives to us and we’ll get them back to you, performance-ready. More information about sharpening as well as our other classes and the knives we carry from around the world can be found on our website at vivront dot com.


Without further ado, enjoy the Kitchen Knife Skills 101 Course, and please reach out with feedback and/or comments regarding your learning experience! We want to make this course, and your future cooking endeavors, as easy and enjoyable as possible.


Happy cooking!


–Your friends at Vivront
target_audience: If you're new to cooking or a seasoned chef, everyone will learn something from this accessible, fun course that results in newfound kitchen confidence and a delicious, fresh salsa.

courses.title: Master Cake Baking: The Complete Introduction
courses.bio: Learn how to bake delicious cakes from scratch in this comprehensive beginner's course!

Butter Cake Methods: Reverse Creaming Method: Vanilla Butter Cake
Introduction to Oil Based Cakes: What is an Oil Based Cake?
Oil Based Cake Methods: Blended Method: Chocolate Olive Oil Cake
Sponge Cake Methods: American Sponge Method: Classic American Sponge

requirements: No prior baking skills required.  This course is perfect for someone who has never baked a cake from scratch.
A stand mixer or hand mixer will be necessary to complete the majority of recipes in this course.
Some other small kitchen tools will be required, however most of them you may already have.
courses.description:
There is so much joy that comes from scratch baking and pulling that perfect cake out of the oven.
Have you always wanted to learn how to bake a cake that has the right balance of flavor, moisture, and texture?
Then this is the course for you!
This class provides all of the information you will need to get started in the kitchen and on your way to baking cakes.  It's packed full of instructional videos, written lectures, and downloadable recipes.
There are 7 valuable recipes:
Almond Butter Cake
Vanilla Butter Cake
Chocolate Olive Oil Cake
Carrot Cake
Classic American Sponge
Genoise Sponge
Simple Syrup
There are lessons on the history of different types of cakes so that you will not only impress your friends with skills, but also knowledge.  Baking carries a rich background around the world and helps to build an appreciation of learning the art.
Whether you are a complete beginner, want to start a career in the pastry industry, or just want to make your cakes a little bit better, this course will set you up for success!
target_audience: Beginner bakers who have never baked a cake before.
Anyone who wants a professional look at cake baking.
Passionate individuals who may be interested in a career in baking and pastry arts.
Professionals who may already decorate cakes, but would like to learn the baking side of production.
Bakers searching for tested recipes that work well and taste great every time.
Anyone who wants to be a better home baker to share with friends and family.
Bakery and pastry purveyors looking for new menu items.

courses.bio: This program cover the cartoon style animal figurine
objectives: Learn animal cartoon made by fondant
Learn Sugar dough shapes of animals
Learn funny animal figurines
Learn fondant skills showing animal cartoons

courses.description:

Making  face, Hands, Legs, body and the balance of all different part are tricky job, and the body proportion and heights have to taken care of.  Chef Thad will also talk about color scheme and how to achieve that.
Unleash Your Artistry in Cake Designing and Fondant Figurines with Chef Thad's online class!
This Program will have 5 different
Indulge your passion for cake designing and elevate your skills to create stunning fondant figurines with Chef Thad's exclusive online program. Chef Thad, a maestro in crafting artistic showpieces, brings his expertise in wedding cakes, cupcakes, and intricate fondant figurines—all comprehensively covered in this transformative online learning experience.
Chef Thad's Online Program Highlights:
Comprehensive  figurine Designing: Learn the art and science of creating visually captivating figurines,
Start Your Artistic Cake Journey Today and Please do not hesitate to let us know in case you have any question and query
Don't miss this golden opportunity to learn from Chef Thad, a true artisan in the world of cake designing and fondant artistry. Enroll now in Chef Thad's masterclass and unlock the secrets to creating edible masterpieces that captivate hearts and palates alike!

courses.title: עוגות גבינה מדהימות - מקלאסי למודרני
courses.bio: לימדו להכין עוגות גבינה יפהפיות וטעימות להפליא, שמצליחות בכל פעם, וקישוטים אכילים מתוחכמים ומרהיבים
objectives: לימדו את סודות אפיית עוגת הגבינה, כך שתצא מושלמת ויפהפיה בכל פעם
לימדו כיצד לשנות את הטעם הקלאסי של העוגה, וכיצד ליצור וריאציות ייחודיות של טעמים, בשימוש בפירות ותבלינים
גלו טכניקות ייחודיות להכנת מגוון עשיר של קישוטים אכילים מהממים, כולל קישוטי איזומלט, קישוטים מבצק פילו ומפירות טריים
לימדו כיצד לאפות עוגות גבינה במרקם מושלם בכל צורה וגודל שתרצו
לימדו כיצד לקשט ולהגיש עוגות גבינה אישיות באופן יחודי ומרשים, ממש כמו במסעדות יוקרה מובחרות
לימדו את כללי אמנות האיזון הקולינארי, על ידי שילוב נכון של טעמים, מרקמים וקומפוזיציות

יוצאים לדרך - הקדמה והכנות: מדריך קצר לצפיה בקורס באופן הטוב ביותר
רשימת כלים ומצרכים עם המלצות קניה
הרכבת העוגות והקינוחים ואפייתם: אפיית תערובת העוגיות של בסיס העוגה
הוספת טעמים למלית והרכבת העוגות והקינוחים בתבנית

requirements: הקורס מתאים לכל מי שמתעניין באפייה, קישוט עוגות ואמנות אכילה
אין צורך בניסיון קודם באפייה ובקישוט עוגות. בקורס תלמדו את כל הטכניקות והמתכונים מהיסוד
במהלך הקורס תזדקקו למספר כלי אפייה יעודיים כגון רינגים לאפייה, חותכנים, ומערוך
הקורס כולל רשימת קישורים לחנויות מומלצות, בהן תוכלו לרכוש כלים ומוצרים נדרשים
courses.description:
הקורס "עוגות גבינה מדהימות - מקלאסי למודרני" הוא קורס מעמיק באפייה וקישוט עוגות, המתמקד באחת מהקלאסיקות הקולינאריות הבולטות והאהובות ביותר: עוגת הגבינה. בקורס, שפותח ע"י השף-קונדיטורית עטורת הפרסים אירית ישי, תלמדו ליצור עוגות גבינה מושלמות וטעימות להפליא, שמצליחות בכל פעם שתכינו אותן
תלמדו כיצד ליצור את העוגות בכל גודל וצורה שתרצו, מעוגות גדולות ויפהפיות ועד קינוחים אישיים אלגנטיים ומרהיבים. תלמדו גם כיצד לשנות את המתכונים הבסיסיים, וליצור אינסוף וריאציות של טעמים. בנוסף, תלמדו טכניקות רבות ומתוחכמות ליצירת קישוטים אכילים מרהיבים, וכיצד להשתמש בהם כדי להפוך את העוגות שלכם ליצירות מודרניות ומרשימות של אמנות קולינארית
בקורס אירית תחלוק איתכם את כל הטכניקות, המתכונים והסודות המקצועיים, שהיא פיתחה והביאה לשלמות במשך שנים רבות של עבודה בתעשייה ומול לקוחות בארץ ובחו"ל. רבות מהטכניקות שתלמדו הן שימושיות מאד, ותוכלו להשתמש בהן גם בפרוייקטים רבים אחרים של אפייה וקישוט עוגות
אז למה אתם מחכים? קישרו את הסינר והצטרפו אלינו למסע מהנה מהנה ומאתגר של לימוד, אפייה ואסטתיקה קולינארית
target_audience: כל מי שמעוניין ללמוד לאפות עוגת גבינה מושלמת שמצליחה בכל פעם
כל מי שמתעניין באמנות אכילה, ומעוניין ללמוד טכניקות מגוונות של יצירת קישוטי פילו וקישוטי סוכר
בעלי מאפיות או קונדיטוריות הרוצים להכין ולמכור עוגות גבינה מרשימות וטעימות ללקוחותיהם
שף-קונדיטרים הרוצים להוסיף מנות אחרונות מעניינות לתפריט הקינוחים שלהם
כל מי שמתעניין בקריירה מקצועית של אפייה וקישוט עוגות

courses.title: My favorite crepes
courses.bio: Do you love crepes? But don't know how to cook them? Then just watch our course - it's very simple.
objectives: Follow a short video you will learn step-by-step how to make crepe batter with different recipes.
You will learn how to make stuffed crepes with different various fillings.
You will learn how to basic prepare every filling.
You will learn the recipes that we create ourselves.
You will learn how to cook incredibly delicious crepes.

Introduction: Stuffed crepes with ham and cheese
Stuffed crepes with smoked salmon and cream cheese
Stuffed crepes with stewed cabbage and boiled eggs
Stuffed crepes with pink salmon, eggs and onion

requirements: You do not need to have any special abilities to cook deliciously, only your desire.
courses.description:
Hey everyone!
This is my author's course on how easy and fast you can cook the most delicious crepes. Each of you can learn how to cook with these simple recipes. I have not yet met people in my life who would not love crepes, and children, of course, love them most of all. This is a great option for breakfast, but you can also sometimes cook a few crepes for a light snack.
In this course, you will learn that crepes can be made from simple and affordable products that each of us has in the refrigerator. Many of my friends are surprised when they find out about the composition of crepes and do not believe that such delicious crepes can be made from these ingredients.
What do I like to serve these crepes with?
Of course, many of them are often served with sour cream, fresh berries and fruits, honey, raspberry jam, strawberry jam, blueberry jam, condensed milk, maple syrup, chocolate syrup, ice cream, and many other tasty additions.
Of course, these are just my favorite recipes, I know many more different ways of making crepes, but I can tell you about them in the next courses.
Come to our course and make your loved ones a little happier with these recipes.
Buon Appetit!!!
target_audience: •	Any age, in any country.
•	Absolute beginners in cooking.
•	This course is also for those who just love to cook new dishes and try new things.

courses.title: СЕКРЕТЫ КОФЕ. Часть 1. ИСТОРИЯ - Стань Экспертом за 3 часа!
courses.bio: для КОФЕМАНОВ и БАРИСТА - Как РАЗОБРАТЬСЯ в КОФЕ (30 уроков) - Самый Полный Курс ИСТОРИИ КОФЕ: Просто и Интересно!
objectives: Вы познакомитесь с неизвестными легендами о появлении кофе.
Пройдете путь кофейного дерева, по которому оно распространялось по миру.
Разберетесь, что такое знаменитые "Мока", "Гешир" и "Гахва".
Сможете структурировать основные мировые форматы кофе.
Узнаете, как Османская империя стала главным мировым промоутером кофе.
Научитесь различать "Восточный кофе" и отличать турецкий кофе от греческого.
Познакомитесь с эфиопской церемонией – старейшей кофейной традицией мира.
Узнаете о таких важных, но неизвестных напитках, как Бичерин и Мазагран.
Поймете, за счет чего Юрий Кульчицкий стал настоящей кофейной легендой.
Изучите происхождение и настоящее значение слов "Espresso" и "Barista".
Узнаете, как в Англии появились "чаевые", а Америка стала кофейной.
Раз и навсегда разберетесь в сложнейшем термине Speciality Coffee.
Изучите историю и суть главной кофейной технологии мира – Эспрессо.
Четко классифицируете все "Кофейные Волны" современной истории кофе.

Урок 6. Как Цейлон перешел на чай.
Урок 8. Линия Bourbon: Короли и кофе.
Урок 11. Восточный кофе: Виды и различия.
Урок 12. Венский кофе: Кульчицкий и зерна.
Урок 15. Америка: Джон Смит и кофешоп.
Урок 17. Лондон: Из кофейни – в империю.
Урок 19. Айриш: Король кофе с алкоголем.
Урок 20. Бичерин: Отец кофе с шоколадом.

requirements: ВНИМАНИЕ ! Данный курс является аналогом курса «Как Разобраться в Кофе. ч.1. ИСТОРИЯ», но в варианте для ДЛЯ БАРИСТА.
ПРИМ: Первые 2 видео («Содержание» и «Вступление») – находятся в ОТКРЫТОМ ДОСТУПЕ, и Вы можете свободно ознакомиться с ними.
NB: Данный курс существует также в версии для БАРИСТА.
Прохождение курса не требует дополнительных навыков.
courses.description:
Здравствуйте, друзья, и добро пожаловать на мой первый курс из серии «Как Разобраться в Кофе», который называется «ИСТОРИЯ КОФЕ».
Меня зовут Сергей Реминный, я кофейный эксперт с 25-летним опытом работы в кофейной индустрии, бизнесмен, писатель и 1-й координатор Европейской Ассоциации Спешиэлити Кофе (SCAE) в Украине (2003-2008 гг.).
После нескольких книг о кофе, тысячи статей на моем «Блоге о Кофе» и сотен видео на канале и серии книг о кофе я создал этот онлайн-курс.
Главной задачей, которую я ставил для себя в моем курсе, было перевести сложный кофейный мир в ПРОСТЫЕ и ИНТЕРЕСНЫЕ уроки, понятные как бариста, так обычным любителям кофе.
«История Кофе» даст Вам полное хронологическое понимание того, как кофе завоевал сердца людей и стал самым любимым напитком нашей планеты.
Здесь я не просто изложил все, что узнал о кофе за десятилетия своей профессиональной работы и поездок в более чем 100 стран мира. Я тщательно ГОТОВИЛ все уроки – выбирал только самое нужное и важное и оттачивал доступность его звучания для Вас.
Материалы, изложенные в моих уроках, Вы не найдете в Интернете. Потому что все они построены на моем долголетнем опыте и личном взгляде на историю кофе после изучения ее на протяжении четверти века.
В «Истории Кофе» я не собираюсь поучать Вас, что правильно, а что нет. Моя цель – научить Вас ПОНИМАТЬ мир кофе и ПОЛЬЗОВАТЬСЯ своими знаниями.
Уверяю Вас, что после прохождения курса уровень Ваших кофейных знаний поднимется на новую высоту. И это будут очень и очень ПОЛЕЗНЫЕ знания.
Как сказал один из величайших кофеманов нашего времени – великий французский писатель Оноре де Бальзак: «Изучайте прошлое – оно научит Вас будущему...»
И еще обещаю Вам, что мои уроки будут очень КРАСИВЫМИ и ИНТЕРЕСНЫМИ.
Ну, что – начинаем?..
target_audience: Люди с Любовью к Кофе
Кофеманы, ищущие Новых Знаний
Специалисты, работающие с Историей (туристические гиды)
Любители Кофе, которые хотя знать о Кофе больше

courses.title: Mastering Rioja: A Winemaker's Comprehensive Course
courses.bio: Winemaker Alexander Ivanov`s unique guide through Rioja's history, subzones, grape varieties, and the art of oak ageing.
objectives: Dive into Rioja's rich wine heritage, where centuries of tradition shape each bottle's unique character.
Discover how Rioja's terroir and climate create its distinct wine flavors.
Learn about Rioja’s grape varieties, from Tempranillo to Garnacha, and their roles in making exceptional wines.
Explore the blend of traditional and modern winemaking that sets Rioja wines apart globally.
Understand Rioja's aging classifications—Crianza, Reserva, Gran Reserva—and their impact on flavor and quality.
Master the art of wine tasting and confidently enjoy Rioja’s finest like a true expert.

Past, present and future: From the prehistory to the mid-19th century
The birth of the modern era
Phylloxera and its impact on Rioja
Inside the area of D.O.Ca. Rioja: The area of the D.O.Ca. Rioja
Winemaking styles and maturation: Wine production in Rioja, an overview
Ageing in oak: a distinctive signature
Rioja classification: Classification according to the wines' ageing
Quality Control within Rioja: Creation of the Denominación de Origen Rioja

requirements: A passion for exploring Rioja’s rich wine culture and enhancing your tasting experience.
Basic knowledge of wine (helpful but not required).
courses.description:
Mastering Rioja: A Winemaker's Comprehensive Course
Embark on an immersive journey through the world of Rioja wines with winemaker Alexander Ivanov. This course offers a comprehensive deep dive into one of Spain’s most renowned wine regions, covering everything from its rich history to the practical aspects of viticulture, winemaking, and classification. Whether you’re a beginner or a wine enthusiast, this course will equip you with the knowledge and skills to appreciate and select Rioja wines with confidence.


What You’ll Learn:
Geography & Terroir: Understand the unique geography and terroir that give Rioja its distinctive character. Learn about the region’s diverse subzones, soil types, and climate, which all influence the wines produced.
Inside the Denomination of Origin Rioja: Explore the three main areas of the Rioja wine region: Rioja Alta, Rioja Oriental, and Rioja Alavesa. Discover how each area’s climate and geography contribute to the diversity of Rioja wines.
Viticulture Through the Seasons: Learn how the changing seasons impact grape growing in Rioja. Explore the winemaker's approach to managing vineyards in winter, spring, summer, and autumn to produce high-quality grapes.
Grape Varieties: Dive deep into Rioja’s iconic grape varieties, both red (Tempranillo, Garnacha, Graciano, Mazuelo, and more) and white (Viura, Malvasía de Rioja, Tempranillo Blanco, and others), and understand their role in the region's wines.
Winemaking Styles & Maturation: Master the art of winemaking in Rioja, from the different wine styles (white, rosé, red) to the significance of oak ageing. Learn how winemakers shape Rioja wines using traditional techniques, and maturation in oak and bottles.
Rioja Classification: Explore the classification system that defines Rioja wines, including age-based categories like Joven, Crianza, Reserva, and Gran Reserva. Understand the new classification criteria based on wine origin, and how this system ensures quality.
Quality Control in Rioja: Gain an understanding of the strict quality control measures that govern Rioja wines. From the creation of the Denomination of Origin Rioja to quality assurance in vineyards, harvests, wineries, and post-bottling, learn how each step contributes to the region’s high standards.
Economy, Trade & Marketing: Get insights into the economic impact of Rioja wines, including trends in domestic and export markets, marketing strategies, and promotional campaigns. Understand how Rioja has positioned itself as a premium wine region on the global stage.


Why Take This Course?
Expert Guidance: Learn directly from winemaker Alexander Ivanov, who brings years of hands-on experience and insider knowledge to the course.
Comprehensive Content: Whether you're interested in the geography, grape varieties, winemaking, or the business side of Rioja wines, this course covers it all.
Exclusive Wine Expertise: Understand the region’s winemaking techniques, classification systems, and quality control processes that make Rioja wines stand out globally.
By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge and confidence to explore Rioja wines like a true expert, making more informed decisions whether you're buying, tasting, or pairing wines.


Join Alexander Ivanov in discovering the history, craftsmanship, and future trends of Rioja wines, and immerse yourself in a world of wine mastery that will last a lifetime.
target_audience: Anyone passionate about wine, regardless of experience level.
Wine enthusiasts looking to deepen their knowledge of Rioja.
Ideal for beginners and those looking to refine their expertise.
WSET Level 2 or above students seeking clear explanations of technical concepts.
Non-native English speakers will benefit from slow, clear-paced captioned instruction.

courses.title: だしが決めて！！子どもがおかわりする やさしい和ごはんの作り方
courses.bio: 作る楽しみを味わおう
objectives: 普段はレトルト食品を使っている方でも 少しずつ自分で和食が作れるようになる講座です。
今更聞けない材料の選び方種類、味の違いが分かるようになります。
和食のポイントとなる「だし」の簡単な取り方が身につけられます。
講座の最初に「だし」を作り、ご飯、おかず、みそ汁まで全ての料理に「だし」を活かす方法を学べます。

だしが決めて！！子どもがおかわりする やさしい和ごはんの作り方: 私がこの料理を選んだ理由
本当はめんどくさくない、だしの取り方
みんな大好き炊き込みごはん
おふくろの味　肉じゃがの作り方①
おふくろの味　肉じゃがの作り方②
ゆりさんに聞いてみよう
みその種類とみその役割
海外に行くと飲みたくなる、みそ汁
わが家のだしネタエピソード
家でもできちゃう　だし巻き卵の作り方
ほんとのほうれん草のお浸し

requirements: 包丁や鍋、まな板等おうちにある道具で作れます。
courses.description:
初めからみて頂くと、だしを取ってから
その、だしで料理を作っています。
全て観ると一食の献立になっていて　だし　から広がる様々なお料理を楽しんで頂けると思います。


食材の選び方や味の違いが分かるので
皆さんが食材を選ぶ時の参考になるかと思います。
ぜひ楽しんで作ってみて下さいね！


料理を通して皆様の健康と癒しに貢献できますように！
target_audience: 子供にリクエストされる和食を作りたいと思っている方
食べることで体調が整うメニューが知りたい方
自分も家族も喜ぶ食事タイムを過ごしたい方

courses.title: Iniciación al chocolate
courses.bio: Técnicas de precristalización del chocolate
objectives: Técnicas de precristalización del chocolate
Tipos de chocolate
Composición física y química del chocolate
Condiciones de trabajo
Utencilios para chocolate

Tipos de chocolate y precristalización p: Tipos de chocolate y su composición
Cómo verter tu chocolate en el molde
Método de tableado y precristalización p: Método de tableado o precristalización a mano
Cómo verter tu chocolate para cascos de bombones
Método de precristalización por mantenimiento de cristales existentes

requirements: Microondas.
courses.description:
El mundo del chocolate es fascinante y más cuando puedes aprenderlo de la mano de un chef reconocido, que te enseña sin secretos y que está dispuesto a guiarte sobre lo errores que cometió y que desea tú no los cometas.
Este curso está diseñado a la medida de una persona que desea iniciarse en el camino del chocolate donde aprenderás:


Los tipos de chocolate
Su composición física y química
Las condiciones de trabajo para trabajar
Las técnicas necesarias para una correcta precristalización del chocolate.
Aprenderás a rellenar y sellar bombones,
Verter correctamente tu mezcla en los moldes
Temperaturas del chocolate
Desmoldar.


Recuerda que para seguir aprendiendo debes seguir invirtiendo en ti, ya que es la única manera de lograr los objetivos que te haz propuesto.
target_audience: Principiantes de chocolatería.
Amateurs de cocina, pastelería y chocolatería.
Cualquier persona que quiera aprender del delicioso mundo del chocolate.

courses.title: Pegan cooking and lifestyle
courses.bio: Live healthier, have radiant skin, strong nails, beautiful hair, improve your sleep and lose weight with paleo and vegan
objectives: Pegan cooking and lifestyle - lose weight, boost your immune system, have more energy, be more vibrant and live healthier by combining paleo an vegan cooking
Cooking, healthy lifestyle, gluten free diet, lactose free diet, healthy living
Get healthier with Pegan diet - combination of paleo and vegan diet! Prevent chronic disease, lose weight, have more energy, be more vibrant and sleep better!
Cooking skills, health tips, healthy recipes

Introduction: Principles of pegan diet and lifestyle
Principles of pegan diet, second part
Pegan recipes - healthy and easy recipes: Organizing your kitchen for pegan cooking
Batch cooking, meal prep and co

requirements: Basic cooking skills, kitchen, basic kitchen appliances such as blender, oven
courses.description:
Pegan cooking combines the benefits of paleo and vegan cooking. It is not only a health promoting diet but a lifestyle, that can have a profound impact on your mood and sleep. With pegan diet, you can prevent chronic disease, feel more vibrant, you will have more energy to do the things in life that matter to you and your family. This lifestyle can be very effective if you're trying to lose weight as I've seen in my Mind Body Eating coaching practice.
Our mind, body and nutrition are deeply connected and in this course, you will find out how a change in your diet can have a profound positive effect on your mood and the way you show up in this world. You will also inspire others as with more energy from nutritious food comes more energy to do the things you love. Not only will you find plenty of recipes, but we'll discuss tips and strategies to live cleaner and happier life including mindfulness techniques, sleep and movement. You'll take a sneak peak into my kitchen and I'll help you set up yours as well. Be ready for an exciting journey with no side effects only side benefits!
target_audience: Students wanting to lose weight, live healthier, prevent chronic disease, support their immune system, sleep better, have more energy

courses.title: Elabora kombucha fácilmente
courses.bio: Aprende a hacer kombucha paso a paso
objectives: Aprenderás todo lo necesario para realizar kombucha en casa
Diferencias entre la kombucha y el kéfir
Entenderás los aspectos más importantes del proceso, así como de los ingredientes empleados
Conoce las variables principales del proceso que influyen en la elaboración de kombucha
7 recetas de kombucha
Diferencia las partes de la kombucha

Introducción: Diferencias entre Kombucha y Kéfir de agua
Partes de la kombucha - ¿Esto que aparece en la kombucha, es normal?
Vamos al lío, ¡Elaboremos!: Manos a la obra - ¿Cómo hacer kombucha?
Saborizar y envasar - Ya estás cerca ;)

requirements: No se necesitan conocimientos previos.
courses.description:
Este curso tiene como objetivo que adquieras los conocimientos necesarios para que por tu cuenta, comiences a elaborar kombucha en casa. Puede que incluso ya estés elaborando kombucha, o hayas elaborado kombucha alguna vez, e incluso en ese caso, este curso te permitirá aumentar y afianzar tu práctica y conocimientos para que de forma más consistente, y con criterio, puedas tomar decisiones que te permitan disfrutar de tu rica kombucha.
Una parte importante para que puedas realizar kombucha en casa de forma regular es que tengas una metodología y tengas todo lo necesario preparado antes de comenzar. En este curso tendrás también el material necesario para que cuando así lo sientas, puedas aumentar el volumen de tus producciones y tengas en cuenta los aspectos más relevantes para realizarlo con éxito.
El curso está dividido en diferentes secciones para que puedas seguir un hilo conductor del curso que te permita aprender de forma más ordenada, y además, también te permita volver a ver cualquier lección de nuevo cuando quieras. A lo largo del curso, también encontrarás documentación que complementará la información compartida en los vídeos. Como ejemplo, tienes la infografía de "Los 7 pasos para elaborar kombucha" donde se describe de forma resumida todo el proceso de elaboración de kombucha con las cantidades de ingredientes necesarios para fermentar alrededor de 1 litro de kombucha.
target_audience: Personas que quieran elaborar y aprender a elaborar kombucha
Personas interesadas en su salud
Amantes de la kombucha que quieran ahorrar dinero produciendo su propia kombucha
Toda persona que sienta curiosidad por la kombucha
Personas interesadas en las bebidas fermentadas

courses.title: Making Walnut Passion Candy: The Only Tutorial You Need
courses.bio: Easy to follow and complete recipe & instructions for making a sugary base treat versatile enough for you to modify.
objectives: Make Walnut Passion Candy, a caramelized confection.
Review your cabinets to ensure that you are prepared.
Create your grocery list or raid your pantry to prepare for cooking.
Determine what, if any, challenges will have to negotiate in your kitchen as you prepare to make the candy.
Experience the cooking process including the discipline, intuition, and creativity involved in making candy.
Perform the appropriate actions for staging the candy to set up and harden.
Compare and contrast packaging options and sharing schedules that work from among various options.
Explore packaging options with inspiration from my personal creations.

Cooking: Setting the Candy: Tips and Considerations

requirements: You will need access to a stove, and a sense of the heat settings on your stove top.
You will need a deep sauce pan (5 qt), 2 baking sheets, wax paper, a wooden spoon, and a table spoon.
You will also need a heat resistant hot pad to rest the saucepan on.
courses.description:
The original candy recipe was given to me by a friend at work. I took the recipe home and perfected the candy. I sold it for a while until I got deeper into writing, and put more focus there. Since my friends cannot get enough of this candy when I make it, I though I would put together this training for them and share it with you as well.
This is a course about making candy, specifically caramalized confections with milk, sugar, and butter. The basic steps of combining ingredients in sequence, heating to temperature, and setting to shape are common to candy making of many kinds. The discipline of preparation, intuition about timing, and creativity in making modifications is common to cooking in general. What is uncommon to most people is the satisfaction of making delicious candy at home.
You get 4 things when you enroll in this course:
A new recipe for what I call Walnut Passion Candy
Step-by-step instructions including a walk through of the actual process
Delicious candy
Packaging ideas
The course will take you less than an hour. The candy takes about 30 minutes prep to clean up, with 8 hours of time for the candy to set once you are finished. The course is constructed as a cooking tutorial. I provide the preparation, recipe, walk-through, actual cooking, setting tips, and packaging ideas in sequence.
Feel free to create your own version of the candy by adding items suggested in the course, or selecting your own items to add.
target_audience: YOU SHOULD take this course if you love to make candy, and you are looking for a new recipe to try.
YOU SHOULD take this course if you want to learn how to make candy (caramelized confections) with a basic recipe and easy to follow instructions.
YOU SHOULD take this course if you are interested in crafts and edible gift creation.

requirements: مكينة اسبرسو ومطحنة اسبرسو espresso machine and grinder
courses.description:
من خلال هذا البرنامج سوف تقوم بما يلي:


1. فك رموز علم القهوة: قم بتعميق فهمك لأصول القهوة، وملامح التحميص، وتقنيات الاستخلاص لتحضير أكواب رائعة باستمرار.
2. أتقن آلة الإسبريسو: بدءًا من طلب الطحن المثالي وحتى استخلاص إسبريسو مثالي، اكتشف أسرار ماكينة القهوة الأساسية
3. فن اللاتيه: تغلب على تقنيات رغوة الحليب لإنشاء فن لاتيه مذهل سيسعد عملائك.
4. تحضير قائمة قهوة رابحة: تعرف على كيفية إنشاء قائمة متوازنة ومربحة تلبي تفضيلات العملاء المتنوعة وتعظيم الإيرادات.
5. تشغيل المقاهي: احصل على رؤى حول إدارة المقاهي، بما في ذلك مراقبة المخزون، وصيانة المعدات، والتميز في خدمة العملاء.


استثمر في شغفك بالقهوة وافتح عالمًا من الإمكانيات. سجل في برنامج باريستا CROP TO CUP اليوم وابدأ رحلتك نحو التميز في القهوة!




Through this program, you will:
1. Decipher the science of coffee: Deepen your understanding of coffee origins, roasting profiles, and extraction techniques to consistently brew exquisite cups.
2. Master the espresso machine: From dialing in the perfect grind to crafting masterful espresso shots, unlock the secrets of this essential coffee machine.
3. Art of latte artistry: Conquer milk frothing techniques to create stunning latte art that will delight your customers.
4. Craft a winning coffee menu: Learn how to build a balanced and profitable menu that caters to diverse customer preferences and maximizes revenue.
5. Coffee shop operations: Gain insights into coffee shop management, including inventory control, equipment maintenance, and customer service excellence.


Invest in your coffee passion and unlock a world of possibilities. Enroll in our Barista CROP TO CUP program today and embark on your journey to coffee excellence!
target_audience: beginner barista الباريستا المبتدئ
coffee lovers محبين القهوة
الباريستا المنزلي home barista

courses.title: PASTEL DE NATA - ricetta di crostatine portoghesi alla crema
courses.bio: Prepara i dolci più famosi del Portogallo insieme alla quinta generazione di pasticceri di Lisbona!
objectives: La mia ricetta pluripremiata per preparare l'autentici Pastéis de Nata portoghese (conosciuto anche come Pastéis de Belém, Egg Tarts o Custard Tarts)
Come fare la pasta sfoglia
Trucchi e segreti per preparare il Pastel de Nata come un vero professionista (non sono tutti uguali!)
Suggerimenti generici per ottenere risultati incredibili anche da casa
Storia e curiosità sui dolci tradizionali portoghesi

Storia del Pastel de Nata: Breve storia del Pastel de Nata
Preparazione dell’impasto e della pasta: Impasto Base: con impastatrice e a mano
Pasta sfoglia: trasformare l'impasto in pasta a strati
Crema pasticcera, ovvero il ripieno del: Come fare la crema pasticcera specifica per il Pastel de Nata.
Tocchi finali e cottura: Come preparare gli stampi per il primo utilizzo
Modellare l'impasto e rifinire la crema pasticcera
Fase finale (e migliore!): l’assaggio!: Assaggio e ringraziamenti per aver partecipato! :)

requirements: Questo corso è per TUTTI i livelli - non è richiesta alcuna esperienza nella pasticceria.
Se sei un professionista o hai già cucinato i Pastel de Nata, ecco per te alcuni segreti e trucchi per perfezionare la tua tecnica di preparazione.
Usiamo ingredienti facili da trovare in qualsiasi parte del mondo, non preoccuparti!
courses.description:
Il Pastel de Nata è il dolce più celebre del Portogallo. Conosciuto come Pastéis de Belém, Egg Tart (dàntǎ) in Asia e Custard Tarts in diversi parti del mondo, questi dolcetti di pasta sfoglia sono ripieni di morbida crema pasticcera, ed è difficile mangiarne soltanto uno alla volta. Seguendo questo corso, capirai cosa rende l'autentico Pastel de Nata diverso dalle varianti di torte alla crema o anche dalle torte all'uovo che potresti aver provato fuori dal Portogallo.
Vedremo insieme tutti i passaggi, facili da seguire, e ti mostrerò i trucchi per rendere i tuoi pasticcini professionali come quelli che troveresti nelle pasticcerie portoghesi. Ti darò suggerimenti per l'impasto e incredibili consigli per la crema pasticcera, per bilanciare i sapori e le consistenze in modo meraviglioso.
Se hai assaggiato il Pastel de Nata in una pasticceria portoghese e ti piacerebbe prepararlo a casa, questo corso ti mostrerà come farlo. Se sei un pasticcere professionista e non vedi l'ora di servire autentiche crostatine alla crema nel tuo locale, puoi fare tesoro di un sacco di consigli professionali seguendo questo corso! Obrigado! :)
*** I video di questo corso sono in italiano e includono sottotitoli sia in italiano che in inglese. Il corso include anche ricette e materiale PDF da scaricare in italiano. ***
target_audience: Pasticceri casalinghi e appassionati di panificazione
Pasticceri professionisti
Amanti del cibo portoghese

courses.title: Pasteleria.Bizcochos y Rellenos desde 0.Reposteria.Cocina
courses.bio: Sorprende a todos con tus Tartas.Reposteria,Pasteleria y Postres para negocio o Familia.Pastel,cremas.Curso de Cocina.
objectives: Aprenderás cómo realizar el bizcocho Red Velvet,Bizcocho Cuatro Cuartos,Bizcocho de Mantequilla receta propia y Carrot Cake
Aprenderás 4 rellenos diferentes muy buenos y versátiles
Aprenderás a cortar,nivelar y rellenar 4 tartas
Aprenderás desde 0 a realizar éstas preciosas Tartas para cualquier negocio,cafetería,restaurante o para sorprender y deleitar a tu familia.

Bienvenida: Buttercream de queso crema con Nata vegetal

requirements: No necesita ningún tipo se experiencia
courses.description:
¿Te apasiona la repostería y quieres llevar tus habilidades al siguiente nivel? Este curso de Bizcochos y Rellenos paso a paso es ideal para ti. Aprenderás a preparar 4 tipos de bizcochos irresistibles y 4 rellenos deliciosos, perfectos para montar tartas espectaculares desde cero. Ya sea que tengas una cafetería, restaurante o pastelería, o simplemente seas una amante de la cocina casera, este curso te dará técnicas profesionales con explicaciones claras y fáciles de seguir.


A lo largo de las clases, verás cómo lograr bizcochos esponjosos, húmedos y sabrosos, así como rellenos cremosos y balanceados que encantarán a todos. Al finalizar, montarás 4 tartas completas, combinando cada bizcocho con su relleno ideal, listas para ofrecer a tus clientes o sorprender a tu familia.


Este curso está diseñado especialmente para mujeres emprendedoras, amas de casa y personas con pasión por la repostería que quieren aprender desde lo básico hasta el montaje final. Con recetas prácticas, consejos profesionales y resultados garantizados, estarás lista para crear postres de calidad y conquistar a todos con tus tartas. ¡Inscríbete y transforma tu cocina en una pastelería profesional!
Accede ahora al curso y realízalo desde la comodidad de tu hogar,de una manera cómoda y fácil.

Mamás
Amas de casa
Personas interesadas en la Pasteleria

courses.title: Cocina Creativa
courses.bio: De la mano del chef Camilo Santana, aprende, crea y disfruta el gran mundo gastronómico que tienes en tus manos.
requirements: El curso proporciona todos los materiales y documentos de apoyo
el curso esta hecho para cualquier persona, tenga o no, conocimientos en cocina.
courses.description:
Junto a chef camilo santana, creador de este espacio y de su página, dedicados a las personas de todo el mundo, interesadas por aprender ese “algo más de cada día”, para esas personas está dedicado este universo de conocimientos, donde encontraran un sin número de posibilidades, las cuales son un herramienta perfecta a la hora de aplicarlas en su día a día. Espero todo el contenido sea de su agrado.
Este curso se compone de 10 vídeos, en los cuales encontraran ingredientes, utensilios, pre elaboraciones, elaboraciones y emplatado de cada uno de los platos que se van a realizar. No es solo un curso de cocina tradicional, es un curso de cocina creativa, donde emplearemos técnicas y platos internacionales, y lo mejor es que cualquiera puede tomarlo, desde un experto gastronomo, hasta un apasionado por el arte de cocinar.
target_audience: Este curso esta planeado para cualquier tipo de estudiante, con un requisito mínimo, querer aprender o mejorar sus conocimientos en la cocina.
todo tipo de persona con ganas de aprender mas

courses.title: Kreasi Ide Memasak 4 Masakan Rumahan Favorit
courses.bio: (Rawon, Nasi Goreng Rawon, Mie Goreng Gurih, Dan Ayam Bumbu Rujak)
objectives: Peserta akan mengenal bahan bumbu dasar yang akan digunakan pada kreasi masakan rumahan.
Peserta akan memahami pembuatan bumbu rawon dengan bahan bakunya.
Peserta akan memahami pembuatan bumbu sop bakso beserta bahan baku yang digunakan.
Peserta akan mendapatkan pengetahuan cara pembuatan bumbu rujak beserta bahan baku yang digunakan.
Peserta akan memahami langkah-langkah pembuatan menu rawon dan nasi goreng rawon.
Peserta akan memahami langkah-langkah pembuatan menu mie goreng gurih dengan bumbu yang disudah dibuat.
Peserta akan mendapatkan pengetahuan pembuatan menu ayam bumbu rujak.
Peserta akan mendapatkan pengetahuan berbisnis online dari usaha penjualan makanan rumahan.

Kreasi Ide Memasak 4 Masakan Rumahan Fav: Kuis Kreasi Ide Memasak 4 Masakan Rumahan

requirements: Pelatihan ini dapat diikuti oleh siapapun yang memiliki hobi atau keinginan untuk mempelajari varian menu masakan rumahan dan menjadikannya sebagai peluang usaha. Pelatihan ini berada pada tingkat dasar/pemula.
courses.description:
Halo Sobat Ilmu! Sekarang ini, banyak orang yang membuka usahanya dibidang kuliner, hanya saja bingung makanan apa yang cocok untuk dijual online dibandingkan bisnis kuliner yang sudah ada diluar sana.
Pelatihan ini dapat membantu para tenaga kerja yang dirumahkan untuk belajar memulai usaha sendiri dari rumah. Kreasi makanan tentu sudah banyak dijualkan oleh para pebisnis kuliner, terutama pada masakan rumahan karena pasti disukai semua orang.
Masakan rumahan merupakan yang juga menjadi comfort food bagi siapa saja yang bertujuan untuk menimbulkan rasa hangat dan nyaman, yang menimbulkan nostalgia atau nilai tersendiri bagi seseorang. Biasanya makanan rumahan memiliki nilai kalori sangat tinggi, tinggi karbohidrat, dan mudah disajikan.
Dengan mengikuti kelas ini, diharapkan peserta dapat membuat macam-macam makanan dengan bumbu tradisional yang praktis dan dikreasikan ke beberapa jenis masakan yang tentunya bisa langsung dijual secara online.
Bisnis kuliner juga menjadi solusi bagi orang-orang yang senang makan, namun tidak bisa memasak ataupun orang yang suka memasak namun sedang tidak ingin memasak sendiri. Pilihan bisnis kuliner yang beragam juga menjadi opsi makanan atau camilan agar menu sehari-hari yang dikonsumsi tidak membosankan. Jadi, bisnis kuliner memiliki peluang yang amat besar dan memiliki target konsumen yang luas.
Pada masa pandemi seperti ini pun, orang-orang lebih memilih untuk berdiam di rumah dan memesan makanan secara online demi mematuhi protokol kesehatan. Peluang untuk menghadirkan sebuah bisnis kuliner yang dapat memenuhi kebutuhan makanan di rumah–baik itu makanan berat ataupun ringan–pun menjadi semakin besar target konsumennya.
Tunggu apalagi, Ayo daftarkan dirimu dikelas Cariilmu sekarang juga!
target_audience: Pelatihan ini cocok untuk pekerja yang ingin memulai usaha atau pelaku usaha dibidang kuliner/makanan, Cocok juga untuk yang ingin bekerja di restoran sebagai juru masak.

requirements: no Requirements
courses.description:
صمم هذا البرنامج ليناسب الشخص المهتم في تحضير القهوة المقطرة حيث ستخرج من هذه الدورة ولديك إلمام شامل بتحضير القهوة   المقطرة. تفيد أصحاب الهواية وأصحاب المشاريع للاشراف على موظفينهم من خلال معرفتهم الشاملة


ستتعلم اكثر عن طرق اعداد القهوة المقطرة فالقهوة المختصة في الاساس
مصطلح يطلق على افضل انواع القهوة من حيث المذاق والجودة واسلوب الزراعة ، وهذا المصطلح يطلق على القهوة التي حصلت على اكثر من 80 نقطة من مقياس 100 نقطة من قبل جمعية القهوة المختصة
يجب عليك ان تدرك الاختلاف الكبير بين انواع القهوة العادية والمختصة. فالقهوة المختصة يتم زرعها في المرتفعات ويمكن مراقبتها ومعالجتها بعناية شديدة عند الحصاد حيث يتم مراقبة كل خطوة بدءا من النمو وصولا الي التحضير لتحسين جودتها بشكل دوري.


ويعد قطاع القهوة المختصة اكثر القطاعات من حيث النمو في مجال صناعة القهوة ،ولذلك تقوم الدول المصدرة للبن بالتركيز علي جودة القهوة من حيث مستوى المزرعة وذلك لتحسين نتائج تصنيف قهوتها.
تعد بعض البلدان مثل اثيوبيا واندونيسيا وكولومبيا منبع صناعة القهوة المختصة


يتم بيع القهوة المختصة بسعر اعلي من القهوة التجارية ويتم شراؤها من قبل المحمصة و تجار القهوة بشكل مباشر. ولكي يتم اطلاق مصطلح
القهوة المختصة علي نوع من القهوة يجب ان يتم تصنيف حبوب القهوة من قبل متذوقي القهوة المعتمدين.


يتم تصنيف القهوة المختصة الي 3 انواع وفقا لعدد النقاط التي تحصل عليها خلال تصنيف جمعية القهوة الامريكية في مقياس من 100 نقطة،
فاذا حصلت القهوة علي اقل من 80 نقطة فلا يكون لها تصنيف ولا تعد قهوة مختصة
واذا حصلت علي تصنيف من 80 الي 84.99 نقطة فتصل علي تصنيف جيد جدا وتعد قهوة مختصة.
ومن 85 الي 89.99 نقطة فتحصل تصنيف ممتاز وتعد قهوة مختصة.

courses.title: Harmonização de Vinhos e Pratos
courses.bio: Técnicas de harmonização: o que preciso ver e sentir no vinho e no prato para saber se eles vão harmonizar.
objectives: Harmonização de vinhos e pratos.
Aprenda a criar harmonização e enriquecer seus jantares e ainda a explorar novos sabores e possibilidades.
A harmonização é a mais interessante e rica das fronteiras para quem aprecia bons pratos e boas bebidas.
Com as técnicas aprendidas aqui você vai se surpreender a cada nova experiência.
requirements: Gostar de vinhos e comidas e estar disposto a explorar mais esses mundos.
courses.description:
Se você é um amante de vinhos e de comidas bem preparadas e quer explorar mais estes mundos e, principalmente, a conexão entre eles, este é o curso certo para você.
Aqui vou ensinar para você o que temos que aprender a observar e sentir na comida e no vinho para saber se teremos de fato uma harmonização plena ou se teremos dois itens completamente indiferentes um ao outro. A harmonização pode enriquecer imensamente sua experiência na cozinha ou na mesa de jantar! É todo um novo universo que se abre e uma harmonização bem feita é simplesmente sensacional, traz simplesmente o melhor do vinho e do prato em uma conjunção espetacular de aromas e sabores. Aliás, a regra é: o resultado da harmonização é sempre melhor que o prato ou o vinho separadamente.

Então vamos lá? O curso é super descomplicado e com um pouco de prática sobre os conhecimentos passados aqui você já vai estar desbravando esse mundo como ninguém!

Conte com a experiência de quem já lecionou esse curso um sem número de vezes, com degustações guiadas em restaurantes e vinícolas e treinamentos de profissionais da área. Deixe-se surpreender e avance mais essa etapa no mundo dos vinhos.
target_audience: Amantes de vinhos, hidroméis e boas comidas.

courses.description:
தமிழ் நாட்டு சமையல் வகைகள்:
இட்லி - பொங்கல் - தோசை - சாம்பார் - சாதம் - ரசம் - குழி பணியாரம் - பால் கொழுக்கட்டை
வகை வகையான சாதங்கள்:
எலுமிச்சை சாதம் - தயிர் சாதம் - தக்காளி சாதம் - முட்டை சாதம் - புளி சாதம் - தேங்காய் சாதம்
தோசை வகைகள்:
சாதாரண தோசை - வெங்காய தோசை - மசாலா தோசை - முட்டை தோசை - பொடி தோசை - காரட் தோசை - வெண்ணெய் தோசை - நெய் தோசை
கேரளா சமையல் வகைகள்:
ஆப்பம் - அரிசி புட்டு
குதிரைவாலி / சிறுதானிய வகைகள்:
வெள்ளை ரவை உப்புமா - உடைத்த கோதுமை உப்புமா - கிச்சடி - சேமியா உப்புமா
இடையுணவு வகைகள்:
மேடு வடை - மசால் வடை - உருளைக்கிழங்கு போண்டா - காலிஃபிளவர் 65 - வெங்காய பஜ்ஜி
குழம்பு / கறி வகைகள்:
பட்டாணி மசாலா கறி - தக்காளி தொக்கு - காளான் குழம்பு - பாசிப்பயறு கறி
சட்னி வகைகள்:
தக்காளி சட்னி - தேங்காய் சட்னி
முட்டை சமையல் வகைகள்:
முட்டை பொடிமாஸ் - ஓம்லெட்
பொருட்கள் தயாரிப்பு:
இட்லி தோசை மாவு தயாரிப்பு - இட்லி பொடி
வட இந்திய சமையல் வகைகள்:
பூரி - சப்பாத்தி - பூரி மசாலா
கோழி சமையல் வகைகள்:
சிக்கன் குழம்பு - பட்டர் சிக்கன் மசாலா - மிளகு சிக்கன் குழம்பு - சிக்கன் 65
மீன் சமையல் வகைகள்:
மீன் வறுவல் - மீன் தவா வறுவல் - மீன் குழம்பு
பாயசம்:
சேமியா பாயசம் அல்லது பால் பாயசம் - அட பாயசம் - பாசிப்பருப்பு பாயசம்
பிரியாணி:
காய்கறி பிரியாணி - சிக்கன் பிரியாணி - காளான் பிரியாணி
காய்கறி வறுவல்:
முட்டைகோஸ் வறுவல் - வாழைப்பூ வறுவல்
பக்கக் கறிகள்:
அப்பளம்
சூடான பானங்கள்:
டீ - காப்பி
குளிர்பானங்கள்:
பட்டர்ஸ்காட்ச் மில்க்ஷேக் - ரோஸ் மில்க்
சீன சமையல் வகைகள்:
காய்கறி நூடுல்ஸ்
இனிப்பு வகைகள்:

courses.title: Réaliser des pâtisseries françaises comme en boulangerie
courses.bio: Recettes faciles pour débutant étape-par-étape : réalisez chez vous des entremets au chocolats, fraisiers et choux garni
objectives: Comprendre les bases des entremets français.
Maîtriser les techniques de génoises et biscuits.
Réaliser des mousses légères et onctueuses.
Savoir faire un insert fruit ou chocolat.
Apprendre à équilibrer textures et saveurs.
Monter un entremets en cercle ou moule silicone.
Réaliser un glaçage miroir brillant et net.
Connaître les différents types de chocolat.
Tempérer le chocolat pour décor et inserts.
Réaliser un fraisier traditionnel et revisité.
Utiliser correctement la gélatine et la pectine.
Adapter les recettes aux saisons et fruits frais.
Décorer un entremets avec élégance et précision.
Utiliser le bon matériel pour chaque étape.
Développer une identité visuelle pâtissière forte.

I. Initiation à la pâtisserie et au cake: 1. Présentation de la formation
Liste du matériel nécessaire
2. La batterie de cuisine
3.A Les différentes pâtes et fonds de tarte : Présentation
3.B Les différentes pâtes et fonds de tarte : Pâte brisée
3.C Les différentes pâtes et fonds de tarte : Pâte sablée
3.D Les différentes pâtes et fonds de tarte : Pâte à choux
4. Exemple d'utilisation d'un fond de tarte
5. Les crèmes de base
Fin de la session : Initiation à la pâtisserie et au cake design
Support de cours offert - PDF
II. La réalisation d'un fraisier : métho: Préparer le fonds d'un fraisier : la génoise
Réaliser des sauces et coulis de fraise
Fin de la session : La réalisation d'un fraisier
III. La réalisation d'un entremet au cho: Préparer le fond d'un entremets : biscuit Joconde
Le montage de l'entremets au chocolat
Réaliser des écritures stylisées : écriture chocolat sur pâte d'amande
Réaliser des records géométriques : tempérage chocolat
Fin de la session : La réalisation d'un entremet au chocolat

requirements: Aucune expérience requise. Il est recommandé d'avoir une bonne connexion internet pour regarder nos vidéos filmées en Haute Définition.
courses.description:
[ [ Prix de lancement jusqu'au 31 août 2025 ! ] ]
Réalisez enfin vos pâtisseries comme un pro grâce à un seul programme complet.
La formation où vous pouvez pratiquer en même temps que la formatrice : apprenez toutes les techniques professionnelles que l'on ne trouve pas sur YouTube.


Ce programme couvre tous les fondamentaux de la pâtisserie française spécialisée : quels ustensiles utiliser, comment réussir une cuisson et réaliser des pâtisseries identiques à celles que l'on retrouve en boulangerie. Vous apprendrez comment organiser votre plan de travail et réaliser vos préparations en respectant les normes d'hygiène alimentaires.


Ici pas de contenu amateur que l'on retrouve gratuitement sur YouTube, nous sommes fiers de vous offrir une formation intense en vidéos HD dispensée par une cheffe pâtissière en activité en France depuis 5 ans, qui vous guidera étape par étape. Profitez de ses conseils et astuces pour réussir vos entremets au chocolat et fraisier chez vous mais aussi bien pour des événements privés que professionnels.


Ce programme s’adresse à toute personne qui souhaite :


Acquérir des bases solides en pâtisserie française pour créer des entremets au rendu professionnel.

Apprendre différentes techniques de montage, d’incrustation, de glaçage miroir et de décoration moderne.

Se perfectionner dans la réalisation de biscuits, mousses, inserts et dressages.

Développer leur créativité et leur précision dans l’élaboration de desserts raffinés.

Comprendre les principes d’organisation, de conservation et d’hygiène en pâtisserie.

Retrouvez un seul ou plusieurs modules de cette formation dans nos différents programmes Udemy. Rendez-vous sur notre profil pour en découvrir davantage.

N'hésitez pas à nous poser des questions dans la partie FAQ !
target_audience: Les amateurs passionnés ayant déjà quelques bases en pâtisserie.
Les futurs professionnels ou personnes en reconversion.
Les autodidactes souhaitant structurer leurs apprentissages.
Les créateurs d’entreprise culinaire (traiteurs, pâtissiers à domicile, etc.)

This Course is about cooking, i make new dishes everyday for my family as you know everyone knows cooking but only few have taste so here I'm with full perfection and my food is famous around my circle, So i decided why not to share my recipe with thousand of people so everyone can learn this and get taste in their food, Remember my recipes are so simple and i'm using home masala which are available in every house i don't use shan masala or national in every dish but yes i use it in some food to bring more taste. objectives: 10 түрлі дәмді қамыр тағамдарының рецепті
Арнайы WhatsApp тобына қосылу мүмкіндігі
Арайдан тікелей кеңес алу
Қамыр дайындаудың қарапайым әдістері

Гүл пампушка: Гүл пампушка құрамы және жасалу қадамы

requirements: Бұл курс жаңадан бастаушыларға арналған, сондықтан арнайы дағдылар қажет емес!
courses.description:
Әрбір рецепт ішінде не бар:
Менің күнделікті қолданатын лайфхактарым.
Тәжірибемнен алынған қамыр жасаудың оңай жолдары.
Әр қадамда қойылуы мүмкін, сізде кездесуі мүмкін сұрақтарға алдын-ала жауап.
Әрбір ингредиенттің нақты мөлшері мен пропорциялары.
Қарапайым және түсінікті тілде түсіндірілген видео.
Әр қадамды толығымен түсіндіріп, кезең-кезеңімен көрсетілген.
Қадамдардың әрқайсысын иллюстрациялайтын фотосуреттер.
Видеомен қатар, жазбаша нұсқаулар да беріледі.


Қандай рецептер бар:
Гүл пампушка
Қамырды тез ашыту
Қамырды илеудің тез жолы
Пампушкадан гүл шығарудың 2 әдісі
Лағмын
Лағман үзілмей созылуының сыры
Үйде лағмын созудың ең қарапайым жолы
Барлық қамыр үшін ескеру керек маңызды жерлер
Манты
Манты түю әдісі
Әдімі көтеріліп шығу үшін неге мән беру керек
Манты қамыры біртегіс болатын жаю әдісі


Пампушка
Піскенде неге жатып қалатынын салыстырып көрсетемін
Беті жылтырап іші бірдей көтерілетін пампушканың сыры


Цомян
Дин-дин цомян мен ганбян цомянның да қамыры көрсетілген
Қалай тез турау керек, қалай пісіру керек нақты айтылған


Дамплинг
Қамырды тез жаю әдісі
Дамплинг жарылмай пісетін ерекше қайнату әдісі
Капуста сияқты амбре жасыл дамплинг


Лапша
Қаттыыы қамырды қалай жасаймыз
Жұмыртқа қосатын қамырдың пропорциясын қалай есептейміз


Дапанджи қамыр
Өте ерекше лапша созу әдісі
Қандай қамырға жұмыртқа керек, қандай қамырға керек емес екенін түсіндірдім


Қолданба
Қолмен қамырды тез илеу әдісі
Қолдан қалай макарон жасайтынды көрсетемін


Көкеністі қамыр
Көкеніспен қалай қамыр илейміз
Бұндай қамырды қалай қай кезде қолданамыз
target_audience: Жаңадан бастаушылар – Қамыр жасауды ешқашан үйренбегендер үшін қарапайым әрі түсінікті сабақтар.
Үй аспаздары – Үйде дәмді, сапалы қамыр дайындауды үйренгіңіз келсе.
Тамақ жанкүйерлері – Үйде қолмен жасалған қамырдан дәмді тағамдар жасағысы келетіндерге.
Болашақ аспаздар мен наубайшылар – Қамыр жасаудың негізгі әдістерін меңгергісі келетіндер үшін.

Kviz - Primjer vinogradarskog položaja s vinogradima
Od bobice grožđa do aroma u vinu: Kviz - Rast vinove loze i grožđa

requirements: Ako ne znate baš ništa o vinu, a volite učiti i razvijati se, onda je ovo prava edukacija za Vas! Dobro došli! :)
courses.description: Ovo je kratak osnovni tečaj o vinu u trajanju od oko dva sata. Tečaj je namijenjen potpunim početnicima koji su čuli za vino, ali ne znaju gotovo ništa o vinu. :) Kroz tečaj ćemo proći osnovno o grožđu, o procesu proizvodnje vina, kratko ćemo spomenuti najveće igrače u svijetu vina globalno i u našoj regiji, vidjet ćemo gdje se vino uopće proizvodi na planetu, govorit ćemo o najpopularnijim internacionalnim i domaćim sortama grožđa i njihovim aromatskim profilima, dotaknut ćemo se i procesa sljubljivanja vina i hrane, naučit ćemo kako se otvaraju vina i kako se vino ispravno kuša. Također ćemo spomenuti i puno drugih osnovnih pojmova. Iza svake kratke videolekcije postoji kviz s nekoliko pitanja koja će vam pomoći da se prisjetite onoga što ste pogledali i da malo bolje utvrdite gradivo. Ono što svakako preporučam dok prolazite kroz ovu edukaciju je da pored sebe imate otvorenu butelji vina koja će Vam praviti društvo i pomoći vam da otvorenog uma i srca uronite u nevjerovatan svijet vina! :) Nadam se da će vam ova edukacija biti korisna kao prvi ozbiljniji kontakt s vinskim svijetom i da će vas zainteresirati za nevjerovatan svijet vina.  Ostavite komentar, pošaljite poruku, prijedloge  i podijelite edukaciju sa svima! Ako smatrate da Vam je edukacija bila korisna, molim Vas ostavite 5 zvjezdica! Hvala! ;) Uzdravlje i budite vinoljupci! :)
target_audience: Za sve koji ne znaju ništa o vinu, a žele ući u svijet vina...ili samo žele nešto naučiti.

courses.title: Azeites e vinagres aromáticos
courses.bio: Rápido e fácil
objectives: Como fazer vinagres e azeites aromáticos com ervas e condimentos
requirements: Não há requisitos
courses.description:
Os azeites e vinagres aromáticos são produtos gourmet que podem elevar o sabor de pratos e transformar a experiência culinária. Este curso tem como objetivo apresentar as técnicas e os conhecimentos necessários para a elaboração, conservação e utilização desses produtos, permitindo que os participantes desenvolvam habilidades tanto para uso pessoal quanto para aplicação comercial.
Este é um curso rápido e simples, com base em narrações de fundo simples e aprofundamento com materiais complementares, que traz curiosidades sobre a fabricação de azeites e vinagres, tanto quanto ao processo industrial (brevemente abordado) quanto ao processo caseiro, além de procurarmos entender um pouco da ciência envolvida na obtenção das nossas cores e sabores.
Os azeites e vinagres aromáticos oferecem diversos benefícios para a saúde, sendo ricos em antioxidantes, ácidos graxos saudáveis e compostos bioativos que auxiliam na prevenção de doenças cardiovasculares, no controle do colesterol e na regulação dos níveis de açúcar no sangue. O azeite de oliva extravirgem, por exemplo, é uma excelente fonte de gorduras monoinsaturadas, que contribuem para a saúde do coração e reduzem inflamações no organismo. Já os vinagres, especialmente o de maçã e o balsâmico, possuem propriedades probióticas e ajudam na digestão, além de potencializarem a absorção de nutrientes. Quando enriquecidos com ervas, especiarias e frutas, esses produtos ganham ainda mais propriedades benéficas, como ação anti-inflamatória, melhora da imunidade e auxílio no metabolismo, tornando-se aliados essenciais para uma alimentação equilibrada e saborosa.
Ao final do curso, os participantes terão adquirido conhecimentos fundamentais sobre a criação de azeites e vinagres aromáticos, desde a seleção dos ingredientes até a aplicação na culinária e comercialização. Este curso é ideal para entusiastas da gastronomia, profissionais da área e empreendedores que desejam ingressar no mercado de produtos artesanais e gourmet.
target_audience: Público em geral, profissionais e estudantes da área de nutrição, alimentos e produção vegetal

courses.title: Торт "ЖИРАФ" (ENGLISH SUB)
courses.bio: Видео урок от А до Я
objectives: Рецепт начинки "Шварцвальдский".
Как самому собрать подложку под сложный торт, чтобы торт был надежно зафиксирован и дальнейшая работа была налегке.
Как сделать конструкцию под торт из шоколада.
Как собрать идеальный торт - шар.
Самый простой способ темперирования шоколада.
Как сделать шею и голову из шоколада с начинкой зефир.
Простой рецепт зефира.
Рецепт бисквитной массы для формирования ножек, рожек, ушек, носика.
Рецепт ганаша для лепки.
Как сделать блестящими живыми глазки доступным каждому способом.
Рецепт крепкого, не хрупкого велюра для покрытия жирафа.
Как и чем покрасить и тонировать жирафа.
requirements: Урок не требует профессиональных навыков
courses.description:
Все мои ученики знают, что я леплю свой декор из чистого шоколада. Но делая этого жирафика, я придумала как лепить из бисквитной массы и ганаша. Этот метод не заменяет шоколад, но в таких декорах это очень хорошая альтернатива.
Конструкция, держащая торт: донышко пузика, шея - сделаны из чистого шоколада с начинкой зефир.
В покраске жирафа вообще нет красителей.
Такого чуда жирафика сможет осилить даже новичок, не говоря уже про тех, кто хотя бы пару раз в своей жизни испек торт. Именно по такому принципу можно сделать много разных зверушек и не только.
Из данного видео урока ты узнаешь:
Видео урок на рецепт начинки "Шварцвальдский".
Как самому собрать подложку под сложный торт, чтобы торт был надежно зафиксирован и дальнейшая работа была налегке.
Как сделать конструкцию под торт из шоколада.
Как собрать идеальный торт - шар.
Самый простой способ темперирования шоколада.
Как сделать шею и голову из шоколада с начинкой зефир.
Простой рецепт зефира.
Рецепт бисквитной массы для формирования ножек, рожек, ушек, носика.
Рецепт ганаша для лепки.
Как сделать блестящими живыми глазки доступным каждому способом.
Рецепт крепкого, не хрупкого велюра для покрытия жирафа.
Как и чем покрасить и тонировать жирафа.


Уверена, что от урока ты получишь огромное удовольствие, а также багаж ценных знаний и навыков, которые пригодятся тебе в будущем.
target_audience: Урок подойдет как для новичков, так и для профессионалов

courses.title: Curso de Vinos-Enófilo Calificado
courses.bio: ENOFILO CALIFICADO
objectives: 1. Satisfacción como Enófilo con los conocimientos adquiridos sobre el vino.
2. Ser capaz de comprar vinos que equilibren el costo y la calidad, teniendo en cuenta sus gustos en cuanto a uvas, taninos y categoría de vinos.
3. Capacidad para lograr un crecimiento continuo hasta el trabajo en materia vitivinícola.
4. Conocer cada vez más las etiquetas de los vinos pudiendo hacer análisis del buen gusto.
5. Desarrollar y aplicar pruebas de cata y producir resultados de los vinos analizados.
6. Seleccionar una carta de vinos según el plan del restaurante (mejora del maridaje)
7. Recomendar determinados tipos de vinos a restaurantes y hoteles (periódicamente) o clientes particulares.
8. Participar en el trabajo de una tienda de vinos especializada en varias capacidades.
9. Enseñar a otros sobre el mundo del vino.

Introducción al mundo del vino 1: 5 Coisas importantes en el mundo del vino
5 elementos que afectan la calidad de un vino

Revistas y buenos libros de vinos

Modulo 4 Herramientas del vino: Herramientas para conocer como es un vino
